name: TerrariaCraft
summary:
TerrariaCraft is a Minecraft 1.12.2 (Java Edition!) mod that adds content from Terraria, a 2D game by Re-Logic.
This mod completely changes how newly created worlds look with custom terrain generation, bigger and deeper caves to explore and much more new features and mechanics than just that!
Explore a finite island to find resources and biomes, fight against mobs to survive and progress through the mod!
Our goal is to have TerrariaCraft feel as close to a 3D imaginary Terraria as we can get it.
Stick to us while we develop the mod and enjoy new features that we bring in our free time!
